name: SE2-18 — BAY OF COINS
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Baie Lazare beach (wide). The bay keeps what the sea returns.
Spiral the rope to test your course.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.clue:
The bay keeps what the sea returns.
Spiral the rope to test your course.
properties.visual_description: Wide crescent; coins spill to surf; rope spiral; chest shadow in dunes.
